metadata.feature_description: Allows administrators to create new page templates with name, description, and layout selection

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Validate empty template name shows error

steps.action: Click 'Add Template' button to open the create template dialog
steps.expected: Create template dialog opens with empty fields
steps.actual: Dialog opened with Template Name, Description, and Page Template selection fields

steps.action: Click 'Create' button without entering template name
steps.expected: Validation error message appears for empty template name
steps.actual: Error message 'This field is required.' displayed below Template Name field

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Create template with valid name and description

steps.action: Enter 'Test Template Creation' as template name
steps.expected: Template name is entered in the field

steps.action: Enter description 'This is a test template created for feature testing purposes.'
steps.expected: Description is entered in the field
Template is created and appears in the list
steps.actual: Template 'Test Template Creation' was created successfully and appears in the templates list

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify new template appears in list after creation

steps.action: Navigate to Templates panel after creating a new template
steps.expected: Newly created template appears in the templates list
steps.actual: 'Test Template Creation' template is visible in the templates list with thumbnail preview

steps.action: Click 'Add Template' and enter 'Template to Cancel' as name
steps.expected: Template name is entered in the dialog

steps.actual: Dialog closed and returned to templates list, no template was created

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Validate script injection prevention in template name

steps.expected: System should block or sanitize script injection attempt
steps.actual: Validation error 'The template name can't contain scripts.' is displayed immediately

steps.action: Attempt to click 'Create' with XSS payload
steps.expected: Template should not be created due to validation
steps.actual: Form was not submitted, validation error persisted blocking the XSS attempt

steps.action: Open Add Template dialog and observe available page templates
steps.expected: Multiple page template options are available for selection
steps.actual: 8 page templates available: Cavalier - Main, Test Template Page, Workflow Test Template, and others

steps.action: Click on 'Test Template Page' layout option
steps.expected: Different template is selected with visual indicator
steps.actual: 'Test Template Page' is now selected (shown with green checkmark), replacing previous selection

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test template creation with maximum length name

steps.action: Enter a very long template name (over 200 characters)
steps.expected: System accepts or truncates the long name appropriately
steps.actual: Long name was accepted and entered in the field, visible as truncated in UI display

steps.action: Click 'Create' with the long template name
steps.expected: Template is created with the long name or appropriate error shown
steps.actual: Template was created successfully with the long name, displayed truncated in the list

observations: The Page Templates panel is accessible via PersonaBar > Manage > Templates menu
Default page template selection is 'Cavalier - Main' when opening the Add Template dialog
Template thumbnails are auto-generated after creation showing a preview of the page layout
The system validates for XSS/script injection in template names with client-side validation
Long template names are accepted but displayed truncated in the UI to maintain layout consistency
Description field does not appear to have a required validation based on the UI (no asterisk), but the code in SaveAsTemplate.jsx suggests both fields are checked before enabling Create button
